title.heading: THESE CIRCLES DESCRIBE TWO TYPES OF PEOPLE

panel.text: s - Self is in control and
† - Jesus has no influence in my life.
People like this have never received Jesus into their lives. They remain guilty and cut off from God by their sin.
s - Self is following Jesus as Lord.
People like this have received Jesus into their lives. They have been forgiven and experience God's love.

page.question: Which circle best describes you? Which would you like to describe you?
